root.name: Desert Rats vs. Afrika Korps
root.description: Desert Rats vs Afrika Korps is a real time strategy game that is based on the North Africa Campaign of World War II. Single player features two campaign as the British Desert Rats or the German Afrika Corps. It also features multiplayer.SYSTEM REQUIREMENTSMINIMUM PC REQUIREMENTS:Windows 98SE/ME/2000/XPPentium III 1GHz Processor256MB RAMDirectX 9.0b32MB DirectX compatible Video CardDirectX compatible Sound Card4X CD-ROM Drive1.5GB Hard Disk SpaceRECOMMENDED:Pentium 4 2GHz Processor512MB RAMDirectX 9.0b64MB DirectX compatible Video CardDirectX compatible 3D Sound Card4X CD-ROM Drive1.5GB Hard Disk SpaceMULTIPLAYER SYSTEM REQUIREMENTSTCP/IP compatible LAN or Internet Connection
